Name: Frequency of Request Payment following Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment out of all occurrences of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Request Payment activities that are preceded by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and not followed by any rejection
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment in variants that do not contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Request Payment in the top three most common process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Request Payment with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Request Payment to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur within two months after the initial Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (based on timestamp inference from case progression)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Request Payment activities grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that directly follow Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR without any intervening rejection or resubmission loop
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Request Payment in cases that passed through Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER versus those that bypassed it
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment in variants where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER never occurred
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that are part of successful end-to-end reimbursements (i.e., followed by Payment Handled) without prior rejections by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of Request Payment occurrences to total activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Request Payment in variants that include exactly one approval step (e.g., only Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR) versus multiple approval steps
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that are not preceded by any Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of Request Payment activities that occur after a resubmission loop triggered by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in cases without any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment activities per year (2017 vs 2018) to assess temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in cases originating from departments active in 2017 versus university-wide cases in 2018
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases
